title: Herb & Wood | Mediterranean Flavors, California Ethos
description: Chef Brian Malarkey's iconic Herb & Wood focuses on rustic wood-fired dishes with Mediterranean flavors & California ethos. Little Italy, San Diego.
cleaned_text: Brunch Sunday | 10:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. Sunday Bar | 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. Dinner Monday - Thursday, Sunday | 5:00 to 9:00 p.m. Friday - Saturday | 5:00 to 9:30 p.m. San Diego's Modern Interpretation of Traditional Mediterranean Cuisine OUR STORY Herb & Wood Timeless yet approachable, celebrated Chef Brian Malarkey's Herb & Wood focuses on rustic, wood-fired dishes. The menu elevates humble ingredients, highlights Mediterranean flavors, and brings a California ethos of seasonality and sustainability to every dish. CELEBRATED CHEF Brian Malarkey Brian Malarkey is one of the country's most successful and sought-after restaurateurs. Throughout his career, he has developed over 15 wildly successful restaurant concepts. With his longtime business partner, Christopher Puffer, he founded Puffer Malarkey Collective, a restaurant group that consists of six concepts in San Diego and Orange County. These include [ANIMAE](https://animaesd.com/), Herb & Wood, and [ Herb & Sea](https://herbandsea.com/) in San Diego, and [ Herb & Ranch](https://herbandranch.com/) in Orange County.
